relationships.description: Krassner seeking representation for his book project
Durst agreed to write introduction for Krassner's book

analysis.purpose: To update Jeffrey E. on a writing project and share correspondence with a potential literary representative
analysis.significance: Shows professional networking and writing project development involving political themes

notable_quotes: I've been working on an article for the Village Voice but it seems to be evolving into a relatively short book
I Was a Dishonest Journalist Between Breitbart and Bannon

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced

details: Reference to writing for Village Voice
Book project about journalism and politics

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be private correspondence about a writing project in development

analysis.summary: Paul Krassner emails Jeffrey E. to update him on a writing project that evolved from a Village Voice article into a short book about Trump's inauguration and journalism, and shares that he has contacted John Brockman about representation with Will Durst writing the introduction.
